settings.text: Hurry! Only a limited quantity available.

settings.heading: Free Delivery On All Orders.
settings.text: Free delivery on all UK mainland orders. Next day delivery available at checkout.
settings.popup_text:
Free UK Delivery (2-3 Days)
Premium Next Day - £7.99. The majority of our goods are dispatched to you via our overnight box courier DPD Local. For smaller, lighter items, the Royal Mail will be used.

settings.heading: Hassle Free Returns + 12 Month Warranty
settings.text: Buy with confidence and enjoy your purchase to the fullest with easy returns and a 12-month warranty plan on all products.
settings.popup_text: Any issues, you are covered by our hassle free return policy and a 12 month warranty.

settings.heading: Good & Premium Grade Products
settings.text:
Premium: Items like new, potentially ex-display or cancelled orders, offered at a significant discount. These are pristine and indistinguishable from new.

Good: Refurbished items that might have been returned due to a change of mind, user error, or minor faults, now fully repaired. They appear nearly new, with only slight signs of use. All essential accessories are included, along with a comprehensive 1-year warranty for peace of mind.
